name: Krampus vs. Kringle
description:
Krampus has always wanted to control Christmas. After scheming for years he finally has figured out how: steal the hat that gives Santa his Christmas magic.

In this Christmas stealth horror game, play as Santa Claus himself as you defend your North Pole home from Krampus. Will you be able to evade his grasp, get your hat back, and save Christmas?
